name: Investi
author: Investi Services Pty Ltd

sections.description:
Share price charts and announcement widgets for the ASX, LSE, AIM & FSE. Our comprehensive and timely data quickly summarises your current and historical share price performance,displaying charts and widgets to enhance engagement with your investor audience.

Third Party Services

The charting library is provided by highcharts – their privacy policy is available here
sections.installation:
Install Investi either via the WordPress.org plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server.

After activating Investi, go to the plugin settings page by clicking on ‘Investi’ in the admin menu
sections.faq:
How do I get an API Key for a specific stock?

Please email us at contact@investi.com.au and we will provide you with one. (1 month free trial)

I’ve got to build an investor dashboard and I’ve only got 5 minutes, how do i do it?

Please see our sample Investor Dashboard page

What is the complete list of shortcodes and their arguments?

Please see our shortcodes page
sections.changelog:

  • add priceSensitiveOnly flag to accordion widget

  • add settings to hyperlink to WP plugin and updated docs

1.0.3

  • add search box support for announcement widgets

1.0.2

  • slick carousel was not working on some WP installations

1.0.1

  • fixed issue when shortcodes were not passed any arguments

1.0

  • Initial release
